General.Name: Capri Nusa Satu Properti Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Capri Nusa Satu Properti Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property and real estate development business in Indonesia. The company develops resorts, meeting houses, and office buildings. It also rents office space. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in East Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Capri Nusa Satu Properti Tbk is a subsidiary of PT RDW Global Investasi.
General.Address: Gedung Multi Piranti Graha, Jakarta Timur, Indonesia, 13440
